Test Name: FH Mutation Analysis using Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS)
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tumor tissue or fresh frozen tumor tissue
Purpose: Accurate detection of FH (Fumarate Hydratase) gene mutations in tumor samples for diagnosis, prognosis, and therapeutic decision-making in suspected hereditary leiomyomatosis and renal cell carcinoma (HLRCC) syndrome.
Container: FFPE tissue blocks/slides or cryovials for fresh frozen tissue
Equipment: Microtome, DNA extraction kit, NanoDrop or Qubit quantifier, Illumina MiSeq/NextSeq NGS platform, thermal cycler, Bioanalyzer or TapeStation
